title: The Far Side of Silence
description: Alexander Gray is an ex-Navy Seal with an impossible assignment. Air Force One is shot down over the Mediterranean Sea with no survivors. The successor to the president secretly orders the U.S. Navy to prepare the Sigonella Naval Air Station on Sicily for a clandestine and experimental operation to save the life of the Russian president, the man most Americans believe responsible for the downing of Air Force One. Antagonistic forces within the U.S., Russian governments are determined to prevent that operation from taking place.From the U.S. to Sigonella, Gray must evade and outwit those working against the new president. Will Gray survive to bring the traitors to justice and execute the daring operation?
author: Robert B. Marcus Jr.
